document_title: Document 1: Introduction to ROYA, Sleeping Beauty Bot, and Flexxable Automation Support
document_content:
Flexxable is a specialised AI automation agency that provides tools, templates, and workflows to help agencies, marketers, and business owners generate leads, manage clients, and automate sales processes. Central to this ecosystem is ROYA, which is a prebuilt snapshot system designed to accelerate onboarding, funnel setup, and automation for clients. ROYA snapshots include prebuilt pipelines, Hand Raiser Funnels, workflows, automations, and pre-designed ads, making it easier for users to implement complex marketing campaigns without starting from scratch. The Sleeping Beauty Bot is one of the main automation tools provided within ROYA. Itâ€™s designed for lead reactivation, nurturing, and follow-ups, particularly targeting contacts who have previously interacted with a business but did not convert. Using SMS, email, and AI-generated sequences, the Sleeping Beauty Bot helps turn dormant leads into active opportunities. This bot operates seamlessly within GoHighLevel (GHL) accounts, connecting leads to pipelines and automations while keeping all communications organised and GDPR compliant.

The process begins with importing a ROYA snapshot into a connected GHL subaccount. This snapshot contains everything needed for a complete automation setup: the pipeline structure, workflows, Hand Raiser Funnels, prebuilt ads, and automation triggers. After importing, the client must ensure that workflows are switched ON and triggers are properly configured, such as â€œform submissionâ€ or â€œtag applied.â€ Once live, the Sleeping Beauty Bot automatically engages leads through scheduled messages and emails, personalising communications based on lead behaviour and tags.

For support and troubleshooting, the Flexxable customer support system focuses on clear, short, and actionable guidance. Common issues include snapshot import errors, pipelines not updating, or leads not appearing in GHL. Replies are structured to first confirm details, then provide precise next steps. For instance:

Snapshot Import Issues: â€œCan you confirm which GHL account youâ€™re importing into? Most errors happen if the snapshot is added to the wrong subaccount.â€

Leads Not Showing: â€œEvery lead should appear in Opportunities. Can you check if your workflow is turned ON after importing the snapshot?â€

Workflow Issues: â€œCan you check what trigger you used for your workflow? Most times itâ€™s missing the â€˜form submissionâ€™ or â€˜tag applied.â€™â€

The support system also provides guidance for new users and sales queries. New users are welcomed with instructions to connect their GHL account and import a ROYA snapshot, ensuring they have a live Hand Raiser Funnel for lead capture. For sales-driven queries, the focus is on running prebuilt ads within the snapshot, connecting leads straight to pipelines, and showing users where to activate them efficiently.

Flexxable encourages a step-by-step approach: importing the snapshot, activating workflows, confirming pipelines are capturing leads, and ensuring automations are functional. Users are guided to personalise pipelines, automate lead tags, and track every opportunity efficiently. The agency also offers guidance on leveraging AI tools to enhance outreach, ad copy, and messaging, creating a fully automated lead generation system.

document_title: Document 2: Flexxable Customer Support Workflow and Reply System
document_content: At Flexxable, our customer support is designed to be clear, concise, and action-oriented, ensuring clients can implement ROYA snapshots, Sleeping Beauty Bot, and automations without confusion. Our role is to guide clients step by step, troubleshoot issues, and provide precise solutions while keeping communication friendly and encouraging. When a client reaches out, the first step is clarifying their issue. Often, messages are vague, so we ask targeted questions to understand whether they mean ROYA snapshots, GHL pipelines, Hand Raiser Funnels, or ad setup. Examples of clarifying questions include: â€œDo you mean inside ROYA or inside GHL?â€ â€œAre you talking about the ads setup or the funnel setup?â€  â€œWhen you say itâ€™s not working, do you mean leads arenâ€™t showing or automations arenâ€™t firing?â€ â€œDo you want me to guide you on importing the snapshot or activating workflows?â€ Once we understand the problem, we provide precise, step-by-step solutions. Each reply is tailored to the clientâ€™s workflow, whether itâ€™s activating automations, troubleshooting snapshot imports, or connecting prebuilt ads. Examples of actionable replies include: Snapshot Import Problems: â€œCan you confirm which GHL account youâ€™re importing into? Most errors happen if the snapshot is added to the wrong subaccount.â€ Leads Not Showing in GHL: â€œEvery lead should appear in Opportunities. Can you check if your workflow is turned ON after importing the snapshot?â€ Pipeline Not Updating: â€œThis usually means the workflow isnâ€™t active. Do you want me to walk you through switching it on?â€ Ads Not Connecting: â€œAre you using the prebuilt Hand Raiser ads or creating your own? Thatâ€™ll help me give you the right steps.â€ Workflow Not Running: â€œCan you check what trigger you used for your workflow? Most times itâ€™s missing the â€˜form submissionâ€™ or â€˜tag applied.â€™â€ Our support principles emphasise being supportive and encouraging. We acknowledge client effort, guide them through learning curves, and maintain a friendly tone that reduces frustration. All replies are kept short and actionable, avoiding long explanations or unnecessary technical jargon unless the client asks for it. We also have ready-made responses for common client situations: New Users: â€œWelcome aboard ğŸ‘‹ First step is importing your ROYA snapshot into GHL. Have you already connected your GHL account?â€ Clients Stuck: â€œGot it ğŸ‘ can you share if itâ€™s the workflow or the funnel giving you trouble? That way I can give you the exact fix.â€ Sales Questions: â€œThe fastest way is to run the Hand Raiser ads in your snapshot. They connect straight to your GHL pipeline. Do you want me to show you where to activate them?â€ Automation Issues: â€œAutomations wonâ€™t work unless switched ON after importing. Can you check if the toggle is active?â€ Pipeline Questions: â€œAll your leads appear under Opportunities in your pipeline. Do you want me to show you how to rename the stages for your niche?â€ Our team ensures that every support interaction moves the client forward, whether thatâ€™s checking account permissions, activating workflows, or guiding them through tag-based automations. We document common issues and solutions so that agents can respond quickly, maintain consistency, and reduce client wait time. Ultimately, the focus of our work is to empower clients to use ROYA and Sleeping Beauty Bot effectively while providing hands-on support, clear instructions, and step-by-step guidance. This ensures that all clientsâ€”from first-time users to experienced marketersâ€”can fully leverage the tools provided by Flexxable and get measurable results without unnecessary delays.

document_title: Document 3: Common Client Questions and Flexxable Support Replies
document_content: At Flexxable, client inquiries typically fall into five main categories: Snapshot import issues, leads and pipeline visibility, workflow and automation problems, ad connectivity, and general setup guidance. Our support approach is to quickly identify the category, ask clarifying questions, and provide a precise step-by-step solution. 1. Snapshot Import Issues Clients often face errors while importing ROYA snapshots into their GHL subaccounts. Common questions include: â€œThe snapshot isnâ€™t importing. What should I do?â€ â€œI get an error when trying to add the snapshot to my GHL account.â€ â€œIs there a special permission needed for import?â€ Replies we offer: â€œCan you confirm which GHL account youâ€™re importing into? Most errors happen if the snapshot is added to the wrong subaccount.â€ â€œCheck if your user role has â€˜adminâ€™ permissions for that subaccount. Without it, the snapshot wonâ€™t import fully.â€ â€œTry refreshing the account and re-importing. Sometimes the cache causes the import to fail.â€ 2. Leads Not Showing in Pipelines Clients frequently report that captured leads arenâ€™t appearing in their GHL pipeline or Opportunities. Questions include: â€œI filled out the funnel but no leads appear.â€ â€œWhy arenâ€™t my test leads showing up?â€ Replies we offer: â€œEvery lead should appear in Opportunities. Can you check if your workflow is turned ON after importing the snapshot?â€ â€œEnsure your Hand Raiser Funnel is live and that tags are being applied correctly. Leads without tags may not move into the pipeline.â€ â€œCheck that the funnel form submissions trigger the workflow. Often the trigger is missing.â€ 3. Workflow or Automation Not Running Clients sometimes see automations not firing. Typical questions: â€œMy SMS sequence isnâ€™t sending automatically.â€ â€œThe workflow is on, but leads arenâ€™t moving between stages.â€ Replies we offer:  â€œThis usually means the workflow isnâ€™t active. Do you want me to walk you through switching it on?â€  â€œCan you check what trigger you used for your workflow? Most times itâ€™s missing the â€˜form submissionâ€™ or â€˜tag applied.â€™â€ â€œMake sure all template messages exist. Missing templates can block workflow execution.â€  4. Ad Setup and Connectivity Issues Some clients create or import ads but find them unlinked to the funnel. Questions include: â€œThe prebuilt Hand Raiser ads arenâ€™t connecting to GHL.â€ â€œI created my own Facebook ad, but leads arenâ€™t coming in.â€ Replies we offer: â€œAre you using the prebuilt Hand Raiser ads or creating your own? Thatâ€™ll help me give you the right steps.â€ â€œVerify your domain in Facebook Ads Manager. Unverified domains can block lead capture.â€  â€œCheck that the ad is linked to the correct funnel in ROYA. Sometimes the funnel connection needs to be re-synced.â€ 5. General Guidance and Onboarding Questions New users often ask how to start, what each tool does, and how to personalise pipelines. Common questions: â€œWhat is ROYA and how do I use it?â€ â€œWhat does the Sleeping Beauty Bot do?â€ â€œHow do I rename stages for my niche?â€ Replies we offer: â€œROYA is a prebuilt snapshot system with ready-to-use pipelines, funnels, workflows, and ads. Start by importing the snapshot into your GHL subaccount.â€ â€œThe Sleeping Beauty Bot reactivates leads and engages them through SMS and email sequences automatically.â€ â€œYou can rename stages in your pipeline from the Opportunities tab. Would you like me to show you step by step?â€ â€œFor new users, first connect your GHL account, import the snapshot, and make sure workflows are ON. Then test by submitting a lead to see if it flows through the pipeline.â€ Support Principles in Replies: All replies are short, precise, and supportive. We encourage clients, acknowledge their effort, and guide them to the next step. Even if a client is unsure, our first action is to clarify rather than guess. For example: â€œDo you mean inside ROYA or inside GHL?â€ â€œAre you talking about the ads setup or the funnel setup?â€ This system ensures clients always receive relevant guidance without confusion and can implement ROYA, the Sleeping Beauty Bot, and automations effectively.

document_title: Document 4: Example Client Interactions and Support Flow
document_content: Scenario 1: Snapshot Import Issue Client: â€œI tried importing the ROYA snapshot, but itâ€™s failing.â€ Support Reply: â€œCan you confirm which GHL account youâ€™re importing into? Most errors happen if the snapshot is added to the wrong subaccount.â€ Client: â€œItâ€™s my main account. I think permissions are fine.â€ Support Reply: â€œCheck that you have admin access for that subaccount. Without it, the import can fail. Try refreshing the account and re-importing.â€ Outcome: Client confirms import successful after checking permissions. Scenario 2: Leads Not Showing in Pipeline Client: â€œI submitted a test lead, but it doesnâ€™t appear in Opportunities.â€ Support Reply: â€œEvery lead should appear in Opportunities. Can you check if your workflow is turned ON after importing the snapshot?â€ Client: â€œAh, the workflow was off. I switched it on.â€ Support Reply: â€œGreat! Now submit another lead to verify it flows through correctly.â€ Outcome: Leads appear correctly in the pipeline. Scenario 3: Workflow Not Running Client: â€œMy SMS sequence isnâ€™t sending automatically.â€ Support Reply: â€œCan you check what trigger you used for your workflow? Most times itâ€™s missing the â€˜form submissionâ€™ or â€˜tag applied.â€™â€ Client: â€œI only set the tag but not the form submission.â€ Support Reply: â€œAdd the form submission as the trigger, and make sure all message templates exist. That should fix the automation.â€ Outcome: SMS sequence starts sending automatically. Scenario 4: Ads Not Connecting Client: â€œIâ€™m using prebuilt ads, but no leads are coming in.â€ Support Reply: â€œAre you using the prebuilt Hand Raiser ads or creating your own? That helps me give the right steps.â€ Client: â€œPrebuilt ones.â€ Support Reply: â€œVerify your domain in Facebook Ads Manager and ensure the ad is linked to the correct funnel in ROYA. Sometimes re-syncing the funnel fixes the issue.â€ Outcome: Ads start sending leads to the pipeline. Scenario 5: New User Onboarding Client: â€œI just joined and donâ€™t know where to start.â€ Support Reply: â€œWelcome aboard ğŸ‘‹ First step is importing your ROYA snapshot into GHL. Have you connected your account?â€ Client: â€œYes, connected.â€ Support Reply: â€œPerfect. Next, activate your workflows and test your Hand Raiser Funnel with a dummy lead. This ensures everything flows into Opportunities correctly.â€ Support Strategy Highlights: Always clarify first if the clientâ€™s message is unclear. Guide step-by-step rather than giving long explanations. Encourage and acknowledge effort to keep clients motivated. Provide ready-made responses for common issues, so support is consistent and fast. Use follow-ups to confirm resolution and prevent repeated issues. These example logs capture the full client-support journey, showing how we handle questions, provide solutions, and ensure clients can fully leverage ROYA snapshots and the Sleeping Beauty Bot.

1. Overview
Flexxable provides AI automation solutions including ROYA snapshots and the Sleeping Beauty Bot. ROYA snapshots include pipelines, workflows, Hand Raiser Funnels, and prebuilt ads. The Sleeping Beauty Bot automates lead reactivation, nurturing, and follow-ups via SMS and email.

Our customer support ensures clients can implement these tools efficiently and successfully. Support is friendly, clear, short, and actionable, guiding clients step by step.

2. Support Principles
- Be Supportive: Encourage clients and acknowledge their effort.
- Stay Clear & Short: Avoid long explanations; give step-by-step guidance.
- Clarify First: Ask if a clientâ€™s message is unclear instead of guessing.
- Use Flexxable Content: Base guidance on ROYA snapshots, pipelines, automations, and Hand Raiser Funnels.
- Guide Next Step: Always end replies with actionable instructions.

3. Common Client Question Categories & Replies
A. Snapshot Import Issues
Questions:
"The snapshot isnâ€™t importing."
"Error when adding snapshot to GHL."
Replies:
"Can you confirm which GHL account youâ€™re importing into? Most errors happen if the snapshot is added to the wrong subaccount."
"Check admin permissions for the subaccount."
"Refresh the account and try re-importing."

B. Leads Not Showing in Pipeline
Questions:
"Leads arenâ€™t appearing in Opportunities."
Replies:
"Check if your workflow is ON after importing the snapshot."
"Ensure the funnel is live and tags are applied correctly."
"Verify the form submission triggers are active."

C. Workflow or Automation Not Running
Questions:
"My SMS sequence isnâ€™t sending automatically."
Replies:
"Check what trigger you used for the workflow. Most times itâ€™s missing â€˜form submissionâ€™ or â€˜tag applied.â€™"
"Make sure all message templates exist."

D. Ads Not Connecting
Questions:
"Prebuilt ads arenâ€™t connecting to GHL."
Replies:
"Are you using prebuilt ads or custom ads?"
"Verify your domain in Facebook Ads Manager."
"Ensure the ad is linked to the correct funnel and re-sync if needed."

E. General Guidance / Onboarding
Questions:
"What is ROYA?"
"How does the Sleeping Beauty Bot work?"
"How do I rename pipeline stages?"
Replies:
"ROYA is a prebuilt snapshot system with pipelines, workflows, funnels, and ads ready to use."
"The Sleeping Beauty Bot reactivates leads automatically via SMS/email."
"Pipeline stages can be renamed in Opportunities. I can show you step by step."
"First, connect GHL, import snapshot, switch workflows ON, then test with a dummy lead."

4. Clarifying Questions
"Do you mean inside ROYA or inside GHL?"
"Are you talking about ads setup or funnel setup?"
"When you say itâ€™s not working, do you mean leads arenâ€™t showing or automations arenâ€™t firing?"
"Do you want me to guide you on importing the snapshot or activating workflows?"

5. Example Client Interactions
Scenario 1: Snapshot Import
Client: "Import fails."
Support: "Which GHL account are you using?"
Client: "Main account."
Support: "Check admin access and re-import."

Scenario 2: Leads Not Showing
Client: "Leads donâ€™t appear."
Support: "Is workflow ON?"
Client: "No, switched it on."
Support: "Submit a test lead."

Scenario 3: Workflow Not Running
Client: "SMS not sending."
Support: "Check triggers and templates."
Client: "Missing form trigger."
Support: "Add it; sequence will run."

Scenario 4: Ads Not Connecting
Client: "Prebuilt ads not working."
Support: "Verify domain and funnel link."
Client: "Done."
Support: "Leads should flow now."

Scenario 5: New User Onboarding
Client: "Where do I start?"
Support: "Import snapshot into GHL."
Client: "Connected."
Support: "Activate workflows and test funnel."

6. Support Flow Summary
- Clarify the clientâ€™s issue.
- Categorise the problem (Snapshot, Leads, Workflow, Ads, Onboarding).
- Offer precise solution step by step.
- Confirm resolution with client.
- Document unusual cases for future reference.

This master document ensures any support agent can efficiently help clients use ROYA snapshots, Sleeping Beauty Bot, and related automations while maintaining consistency, speed, and clarity.

ROYA Sneak Peek & Anchor Points Link: https://www.skool.com/ai-automation-agency/can-you-trust-clients-to-pay-on-performance Use: Reference for payment agreements and client trust strategies.
